item.title: Problems with NPC Dialogue
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Why does the Dialogue not continue after case 17? The NPC says everything from 16-17, but not after 17.
Case 18 is the player talking back.

[code]case 16:
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
sendFrame126(“O Woe is me! I’ve lost my Julliet!”, 4885);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;

case 17:
		sendFrame200(4883, 591);
		sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
		sendFrame126("Will you help me " +playerName+ "?", 4885);
		sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
		sendFrame164(4882);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
	break;

case 18:
		sendFrame200(4883, 591);
		sendFrame126(playerName, 4884);
		sendFrame126("Yes, I'm brave enough.", 4885);
		sendFrame126("No I'm a pussy.", 4886);
		sendFrame75(pCHead, 4883);
		sendFrame164(4882);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
	break;

case 19:
		sendFrame200(4883, 591);
		sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
		sendFrame126("Oh thank you so much!", 4885);
		sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
		sendFrame164(4882);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
		q4stage = 1;
	break;

case 20:
		sendFrame200(4883, 591);
		sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
		sendFrame126("A dwarf by the name of Dondakan will help.", 4885);
		sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
		sendFrame164(4882);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
	break;

case 21:
		sendFrame200(4883, 591);
		sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
		sendFrame126("You'll find him North West of here.", 4885);
		sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
		sendFrame164(4882);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
	break;


case 22:
			sendFrame200(4883, 591);
			sendFrame126(playerName, 4884);
			sendFrame126("Ok, I'll see what I can do.", 4885);
			sendFrame75(pCHead, 4882);
			sendFrame164(4882);
			NpcDialogueSend = true;
	break;[/code]
